experience.title: Motion Designer at Onesize
experience.description: At Onesize I work in a small team to help companies like Under Armour and Adidas make beautiful commercials. Because we are a small team, I have to wear a lot of hats while working and have a broad set of responsibilities.

experience.title: Animator at Mediamonks
experience.description: At MediaMonks I worked in the 25-person animation team. With international clients and colleagues, I learned how to act and deliver in a high stakes, fast-paced environment.

experience.title: Intern at Onesize (six months)
experience.description: I’d dreamed of working at Onesize ever since I was a kid, so an internship with the company was an amazing opportunity. My first 6 months at Onesize pushed me to a new level in my animation skills and were a great introduction into the world of employment.

experience.title: Co-Owner of Wallfiller
experience.description: Wallfiller was an animation studio that specialized in projection mappings. We worked with clients like Rabobank, Björn Borg, and Philips. What’s most remarkable about my time as an entrepreneur was that I changed from being an unmotivated and frustrated student into someone who loved to learn. I also learned how business works, how to plan projects, and how to make clients happy.

education.title: Brilliant.org Introduction to Neural Networks
education.description: In this course, you'll dissect the internal machinery of artificial neural nets through hands-on experimentation, not hairy mathematics. You'll develop intuition about the kinds of problems they are suited to solve, and by the end you’ll be ready to dive into the algorithms, or build one for yourself.

education.title: HU Open-ICT
education.description: Project based education with a focus on things.

education.title: Mograph Mentor full year online program
education.description: Mograph Mentor is an online motion graphics training program, with an emphasis on career development. We save you time and money, by connecting you to industry professionals who will work with you to grow your portfolio and your skill set. This program is for students who are looking to pursue a full time career as a motion designer. My mentors during this program were Ryan Summers and Lucas Brooking.
